name: GMail Compact Clean Clear
description:
This is a mix of some of the best clean and clear styles at http://userstyles.org, plus some personal improvements for GMail. Thanks to these styles:
  • Gmail Easy Access Colored Buttons: Great work!! Beautiful and classy.
  • Gmail: Native Google Attachment Icons: Nice touch. Smart work.
Thanks to Some Gmail Plugins:
  • Boomerang: http://www.boomeranggmail.com/
  • KeyRocket: http://www.veodin.com/keyrocket/
Thanks to Labs too:
  • Quick Links
  • Google Calendar
  • Multiple inboxes
additional_info:
Changelog: 1.0.11 (Feb 11, 2017)
  • Fixed wrong GLogo due Google changes.
1.0.10 (Jun 06, 2016)
  • Button fixes on filters.
  • A little line removed from settings.
  • Rocket notification moved to bottom.
  • Some minor UX fixes.
1.0.9 (Ene 04, 2016)
  • Changes due Google update.
1.0.8 (Dic 28, 2015)
  • Added styles for SndLtr.
  • Added styles for MailFred.
  • Stop maintaining Boomerang.
1.0.7 (Dic 17, 2015)
  • Cascade updates due GMail HTML changes.
1.0.6 (Dic 12, 2015)
  • Cascade updates due GMail HTML changes.
1.0.5 (Dic 05, 2015)
  • Boomerang better menus.
  • Message View pages tuned.
1.0.4 (Dic 02, 2015)
  • KeyRocket styles added.
  • Fixed menu on Google update.
1.0.3 (Nov 29, 2015)
  • Fixed color on quick links add option.
  • Fixed logo size (gmail for companies).
1.0.2 (Nov 29, 2015)
  • Multiple inbox styles.
  • List compacted.
  • List menu tunned.
  • Google Calendar styles.
1.0.1 (Nov 28, 2015)
  • Quick links styles.
  • Left menu compacted.
1.0.0 (Nov 27, 2015)
  • New compact menu.
  • Adding external themes.
